discussion.content: could be also D because we have the option to uninstall / update package (appear as icons X and ↑ next to the package)

choices.B:

questions.question_text: Which set of features are provided when selecting the “Manage Packages” button in UiPath Studio?
When a workflow is started in Run mode, what happens when there is a breakpoint on an activity?

choices.D: Workflow pauses for 5 seconds when it reaches the activity
choices.C: Workflow throws an error when it reaches the activity
choices.B: Worktlow pauses at the activity until the Continue button is clicked
choices.A: Workflow executes without pausing at the activity

comments.content: because breakpoint work in debug mode only not in run mode .
because only in debug mode exists the breakpoints, not in the run mode

questions.question_text: A developer runs a workflow in Debug mode and the process stops at a breakpoint. In UiPath Studio, which panel allows the developer to set values for variables before continuing the process?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
why not B ?

Selected Answer: C
Correct Answer is C !

choices.C: Executes only one activity at a time and then pauses
choices.D: Re-executes the activity which threw an exception
choices.A: Adds a breakpoint at the current activity
choices.B: Skips the execution of the activity

A developer wants to map the arguments that pass data to and from ExtractQuotationData.xaml to the appropriate variables in Main.xaml.
Instructions: From the drop-down lists in the Value column shown in the following exhibit, select the correct variable that corresponds to each argument.
//IMG//

discussion.content: It should be 'FilePaths' to match the variable type as string[]
